summary: Perks Improved make several changes to existing perks and add new levels for others.
descriptionHtml:
This mod change several parts of existing perks by modifying the values
and / or add new levels to a perk allowing for more fun : )

QuickShot has been changed from 30 to 50 %
QuickShot also have a second level which includes the TrickShot perk
EagleEye have increased zoom and less stamina drain
CriticalShot level requirement have been reduced and another level introduced
ShieldWall bug is fixed (actual values are correct)
Most armor perks are effective even if not wearing a helmet
Matching Set for heavy armor now works for Ebony based armors
Deadly Aim do 3 instead of 1,5 damage
Extra effect perk have two more levels with up to four enchantments
Another level of soul squeezer
Several new levels of Soul Siphon
Another level of Extra Pockets
A fourth level of Magic Resistance
Locksmith have a second level with even closer to open position
Hunters Discipline have another level with 90 % recovery chance for arrows
Every smithing perk have two levels that increase tempering 3 times
Recovery has a third level with 100 % magic regen

Readme and screenshots included in the downloaded file.
